tool_description: Identifies the language of scriptural text passages and provides confidence scores for language detection.

text.description: The text passage to analyze for language identification

error_messages: Empty text provided: Text parameter cannot be empty or contain only whitespace.
Text too short: Provide at least 10 characters for reliable language detection.
Unsupported candidate language: One or more specified languages are not supported.
usage: Input text to detect its language; optionally specify candidate languages to limit detection scope. Returns detected language with confidence score.

alternative_languages.description: Other possible languages with lower confidence
